title: Quarkus 1.13.4.Final released - Maintenance release
content: We just released 1.13.4.Final, a new maintenance release for the 1.13 release train. 1.13.4.Final is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.13. If you are not using 1.13 already, please refer to the 1.13 migration guide. Whatâ€™s new? Full changelog You can get the full changelog of 1.13.4.Final on...
